item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, May 4, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The Alabama Landline That Keeps Ringing (14 points | discuss)
2. Oberon Pi (48 points | 2 comments)
3. Show HN: I taught AI to commentate Pong in real time (90 points | 14 comments)
4. Gorgeous-GRUB: collection of decent community-made GRUB themes (298 points | 77 comments)
5. What went wrong with wireless USB (222 points | 116 comments)
6. Show HN: Free, in-browser PDF editor (561 points | 112 comments)
7. DuckDB is probably the most important geospatial software of the last decade (331 points | 96 comments)
8. Pascal for Small Machines (83 points | 13 comments)
9. Metagenomics test saves woman's sight after mystery infection (134 points | 45 comments)
10. Switch bouncing reference traces for a variety of different switches (36 points | 16 comments)
11. Legendary Bose Magic Carpet Suspension Is Finally Going Global (175 points | 117 comments)
12. Time saved by AI offset by new work created, study suggests (384 points | 355 comments)
13. Elvish – Powerful scripting language and versatile interactive shell (35 points | 17 comments)
14. I built a pixel art editor after playing Octopath Traveler II (67 points | 31 comments)
15. Why can't HTML alone do includes? (314 points | 268 comments)

17. Numerical Linear Algebra Class in Julia TUM (108 points | 4 comments)

19. When flat rate movers won't answer your calls (254 points | 176 comments)

21. Evidence of controversial Planet 9 uncovered in sky surveys taken 23 years apart (15 points | 2 comments)
22. DotnetSnes: Library allowing to use C# to create SNES ROMs (37 points | 3 comments)
23. Brian Eno's Theory of Democracy (80 points | 51 comments)
24. QModem 4.51 Source Code (192 points | 70 comments)
25. A PostgreSQL planner semi-join gotcha with CTE, LIMIT, and RETURNING (46 points | 37 comments)
26. We fell out of love with Next.js and back in love with Ruby on Rails (393 points | 346 comments)
27. Google Gemini has the worst LLM API (121 points | 97 comments)
28. Programmers Guide to the AMIBIOS (1993) [pdf] (54 points | 15 comments)
29. Helpcare AI (YC F24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
30. Why I stopped angel investing after 15 years, and what I'm doing instead (211 points | 167 comments)
